roleset.name: exchange letters with or communicate generally, exchange of communication
roleset.note: CORRESPOND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'correspond' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries battle-36.4-1, correspond-36.1. (from correspond.01-v)

example.name: pen pal
example.text: John has been corresponding with a friend in Lower Slobovia for quite some time now.
example.arg: with a friend in Lower Slobovia

example.text: With due respect to `` highly classified correspondence '' and other buzzwords , the leakers are performing a public service .

example.name: decent example
example.text: The agency noted that because of a strike by Finance Ministry personnel the provisional estimate doesn't correspond exactly to the consumer price index usually published.
example.arg: to the consumer price index usually published

example.name: both args
example.text: Dispersion relation for the causal transform and its correspondence with a one dimensional dynamical system;
example.arg: with a one dimensional dynamical system
